import{configureStore,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";//받아오는 데이터//
var initialState={userLoading:false,userData:null,error:null,token:null};var userSlice=createSlice({name:"users",initialState:initialState,reducers:{// Login
loginRequest:function loginRequest(state,_action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},loginSuccess:function loginSuccess(state,action){alert("\uC11C\uBC84 \uB85C\uADF8\uC778 \uC131\uACF5 ".concat(JSON.stringify(action.payload)));state.userLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;},loginFailure:function loginFailure(state,action){alert("\uC11C\uBC84 \uB85C\uADF8\uC778 \uC2E4\uD328 ".concat(JSON.stringify(action.payload)));state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},//join
joinRequest:function joinRequest(state,_action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},joinSuccess:function joinSuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;},joinFailure:function joinFailure(state,action){alert("\uD68C\uC6D0\uAC00\uC785 \uC2E4\uD328 ".concat(action.payload));state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},//modify
modifyRequest:function modifyRequest(state,_action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},modifySuccess:function modifySuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;},modifyFailure:function modifyFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},//exist
existRequest:function existRequest(state,_action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},existSuccess:function existSuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;},existFailure:function existFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},deleteRequest:function deleteRequest(state,_action){alert("slice :: ".concat(_action.payload));state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;},deleteSuccess:function deleteSuccess(state,action){state.userLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;},deleteFailure:function deleteFailure(state,action){state.userLoading=true;state.error=null;}}});var store=configureStore({reducer:{user:userSlice.reducer}});var reducer=userSlice.reducer,actions=userSlice.actions;var modifyRequest=actions.modifyRequest,modifyFailure=actions.modifyFailure,modifySuccess=actions.modifySuccess,existFailure=actions.existFailure,existRequest=actions.existRequest,existSuccess=actions.existSuccess,loginRequest=actions.loginRequest,loginSuccess=actions.loginSuccess,loginFailure=actions.loginFailure,joinFailure=actions.joinFailure,joinRequest=actions.joinRequest,joinSuccess=actions.joinSuccess,deleteFailure=actions.deleteFailure,deleteRequest=actions.deleteRequest,deleteSuccess=actions.deleteSuccess;export{modifyRequest,modifyFailure,modifySuccess,existFailure,existRequest,existSuccess,loginRequest,loginSuccess,loginFailure,joinFailure,joinRequest,joinSuccess,deleteFailure,deleteRequest,deleteSuccess};export default reducer;
